10 void By_Reference/CopyRestore(int f, int m, int l){
11 int p = 4;
12 int n = 1;
13
14 p = f;
15 l = n + p;
16 f = n + f;
17 n = f;
18 m = n + p;
19 f = m + n;
20 n = m;
